name: Bacta Tank
Lore: 'Medical wonder invented centuries ago by the Vratix insectoid species. Gelatinous red bacta is suspended in a synthetic solution to create a healing bacterial medium.',
Text: 'Use 4 Force to deploy on your side of table. A non-droid character you just lost may be placed here instead of Lost Pile. Holds 1 ''patient'' at a time. During your deploy phase, may use X Force to bring ''patient'' to hand, where X = deploy cost of ''patient.''',
